sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../LandingPage.css'; const Landing = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleNavigation = (path) => { if (path === 'login') { navigate('/login'); } else if (path === 'signup') { navigate('/signup'); } else { window.location.href = path; } }; return (
{/* Navigation Bar */}
{/* CORRECTED: The logo div is a direct child of nav */}
Event-ually Perfect
{/* CORRECTED: The nav-links div is a separate, direct child of nav */}
Services About
{/* Hero Section */}

Event-ually Perfect

We give you all the tools needed to create unforgettable experiences tailored to your vision. From intimate gatherings to grand celebrations, we handle every detail so you can enjoy the moment.

{/* Services Section */}

Our Services

We are here to help you

We offer a wide range of services to make your event planning experience hassle-free and stress-free.

Guest Management

Track RSVPs, dietary needs, and seating in one place.

Vendor Coordination

Compare and book caterers, venues, and more.

Event Blueprints

Design floorplans and schedules with drag-and-drop.

{/* About Section */}

Why We Do It

At Event-ually Perfect, we believe every celebration should be as unique as the people it honors. Your events aren't just dates on a calendarâ€”they're the milestones that define your story.

Custom Design

Themes that reflect your personality

Seamless Execution

Precision coordination so you can be present

Thoughtful Details

From signature cocktails to custom timelines

Because your wedding should taste like childhood memories. Because your gala should spark the same excitement as your first success. We don't just plan eventsâ€”we design experiences that disappear into the background, leaving only the joy of connection.

); }; export default Landing;
